title: 'Life in Pieces' Episode 4 Spoilers and Episode 3 Recap: More Family Craziness
text: 'Life in Pieces' Episode 4 Spoilers and Episode 3 Recap: More Family Craziness Thursday, 8 October 2015 (1 minute ago) In the upcoming episode, Greg will stand up to his mother, and in the previous episode, Matt introduced Colleen to the family.
